description:
Motor vehicle accident injuries can negatively impact all areas of a person's life, including physical, emotional and financial well-being. Robinson Law Firm PLLC in Louisville, Kentucky, cannot undo the damage caused by another person's negligence, but we can help make it right. We guide clients through the complex and often overwhelming legal process, help them understand their rights and pursue a course of action that will yield the best possible outcome.

Our law firm is dedicated to the pursuit of justice in all areas of personal injury law. Car wrecks, though one of the most common causes of personal injury, are just the tip of the iceberg. Our knowledgeable and dedicated attorneys can adeptly handle cases that stem from a number of adverse incidents:

• Animal bites
• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Class action lawsuits
• Bad faith insurance
• Construction accidents
• Assault and battery
• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home abuse
• Products liability
• Premises liability
• Wrongful death

The founding attorney of Robinson Law Firm PLLC, attorney Howard Lindsay Robinson, obtained his law degree from the University of Michigan in 1975. Since then, Mr. Robinson worked as an attorney for the federal government, the Solicitor's Office of the United States Department of Labor and in a private practice in Washington, D.C. Since establishing his firm in Louisville more than 20 years ago, he and his associate, attorney Lynne Stone, have been representing clients in personal injury matters. Our firm offers free consultations.
